participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Adventurous and determined, enjoys exploring the outdoors.
participant_1.background: i live in colorado. i like to go hiking in the spring. my favorite activity is rock climbing. i am a mechanical engineer.

participant_2.name: Lily
participant_2.personality: Creative and playful, loves to imagine and play with friends.
participant_2.background: i like to play with my dolls. my best friend lives next door. i do not pick up my toys. i have a pet turtle.

content.text: Hello, do you have a pet?
